colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @054A *, ,(CES DPAL LDAN SHANGS PA BKA' BRGYUD KYI RING LUGS DRI MA MED PA LAS NYE BAR BYON PA'I RGYUD SDE LNGA RIGS BSDUS KYI DKYIL 'KHOR CHEN POR DBANG BSKUR TSUL GYI CHO GA LAG TU BLANG BDE BAR BKOD PA DNGOS GRUB RIN CHEN 'BYUNG GNAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RGYAL BA'I MDO SNGAGS YONGS SU SNGOGS PA'I MNGA' BDAG BKA' DRIN MTSUNGS MED RIGS KUN KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHOS KYI RGYAL PO MKHAN CHEN MCHOG GI SPRUL PA'I SKU RIN PO CHES BKA' STZAL BA SPYI BOS NOS TE, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI BKA' DRIN LAS BYUNG SDE CHEN PO 'DI DAG GI DKYIL 'KHOR SO SO BA DANG RIGS BSDUS KYI DBANG DANG GDAMS NGAG MANG DU THOB PA'I DGE SBYONG RIG PA 'DZIN PA'I GZUGS BRNYAN ^DAM TSIG RDO RJE ZHES BGYI BAS, 'JAM MGON RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I LEGS BSHAD KYI DGONGS GZHIR BZUNG, LUGS 'DI'I SROL 'DZIN MKHAS GRUB DAM PA RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I DKYIL CHOG RGYAS BSDUS DU MA'I LEGS CHAS BRGYAN TE 'JUG PA BDE BAR CHOS SDE CHEN PO SE RA THEG CHEN GLING GI CHOS GUR GRUB PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD KYI DPAL DANG LDAN PA'I RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS SO, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
